duties_responsibilities.duty: Seek out, partner with, and learn from the world’s best investors to allocate MIT’s capital to compelling public and private investment opportunities.
Evaluate both the people who run external investment firms and the assets they own.
Sit on the internal investment committee and voice independent opinions regardless of experience or tenure.
Formulate strategies, write investment proposals, and negotiate investment partnerships.
Travel globally to meet with underfollowed investors, evaluate real estate developments, and lead data-driven research projects.
Present whitepapers to the Board of Directors and optimize investment sizing decisions through research projects.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Finance, Economics, or related field (Master's preferred)
